short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for sending webhooks to FlexDeploy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flexagon offers a browser extension for sending webhooks to your FlexDeploy instance, allowing you to trigger actions in FlexDeploy from any URL through the extension popup window. This enables you to send webhooks from applications where native outgoing webhooks arenâ€™t yet supported or don't meet requirements.

Features:
*Send webhooks to FlexDeploy with user-defined attributes
*Create actions to store and reuse a consistent payload format
*Grab content from the current browser window to autofill property values
*Base action support available for Oracle Application Express, Oracle Business Intelligence, Oracle Integration Cloud, Oracle RESTful Data Services, and Salesforce Metadata.
